alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 1:26PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, Lewis and Oswego Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 124 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a narrow line of heavy rain showers, with embedded gusty winds and thunder. This line of showers is extending along a line extending from near Wellesley Island State Park to 7 miles west of Central Square. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Fort Drum, Carthage, Lowville, Pulaski, West Carthage, Central Square, Adams, Dexter, Redfield, Glen Park, Herrings, Kring Point State Park, Highmarket, Adams Center, Redwood, Barnes Corners, Selkirk Shores State Park, Whetstone Gulf State Park and Brewerton. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
